text: Hey guys, check out this joke I heard!
speaker: Jake

text: Why did the tomato turn red?
speaker: Jake

text: Because it saw the salad dressing!
speaker: Jake

text: You're so funny Jake, but can you be serious for a minute?
speaker: Rachel

text: Serious? I'm always serious about making people laugh!
speaker: Jake

text: Okay, okay. Let's talk about something serious. Like how handsome I am.
speaker: Mike

text: Ha ha! You never change, do you Mike?
speaker: Rachel

text: So, what do you want to do today guys?
speaker: Jake

text: I was thinking we could go to the park and play some basketball.
speaker: Mike

text: Sounds like fun, but remember I'm not as tall as you guys!
speaker: Rachel

text: Don't worry Rachel, we'll give you a boost!
speaker: Jake
